T01n2925u_001:0: dharmadhātustava dharmadhāto' namas tubhyaṃ sarvasattveṣv avasthita |
T01n2925u_001:2: (1) ye eva dhātuḥ saṃsāre śodhyamānaḥ sa eva tu |
T01n2925u_001:3: śuddhaḥ sa eva nirvāṇe dharmakāyaḥ sa eva hi ||
T01n2925u_001:4: (2) yathā hi kṣīrasammiśaraṃ sarpimaṇḍaṃ na dṛśyate tathā hi kleśasammiśro dharmadhātur na dṛśyate ||
T01n2925u_001:7: (4) yathā dīpo ghaṭastho hi na kiñcid avabhāsate |
T01n2925u_001:8: tathā kleśaghaṭastho hi dharmadhātur na bhāsate ||
T01n2925u_001:9: (5) (1) yena yena hi pārśvena cchidrībhavati tad ghaṭam |
T01n2925u_001:10: tena tena hi pārśvena raśmayas tasya nirgatāḥ ||
T01n2925u_001:11: (6) yadā samādhivajreṇa bhinnaṃ bhavati tad ghaṭam |
T01n2925u_001:13: (7) dharmadhātur na cotpanno na niruddhaḥ kadācana |
T01n2925u_001:16: pāṣāṇakośe sañchannam ābhā tasya na rājate ||
T01n2925u_001:18: nāsau bhrājati saṃsāre nirvāṇe tu prabhāsvaraḥ ||
T01n2925u_001:21: gotre asati vyāyāmaḥ śramaḥ kevalam iṣyate ||
T01n2925u_001:22: (11) yathā hi tuṣasañchannaṃ na dhānyaṃ tat phalaṃ matam |
T01n2925u_001:23: tathā hi kleśasañchanno nāsau buddheti kalpyate ||
T01n2925u_001:24: (12) yathā hi tuṣanirmuktaṃ tat phalaṃ pratibhāsate |
T01n2925u_001:26: (13) upamā kriyate loke kadalyā nāsti sāratā |
T01n2925u_001:28: (14) evaṃ hy asāre saṃsāre nirvṛte kleśasāgare |
T01n2925u_001:30: (15) evaṃ hi sarvabījeṣu sādṛśyāṃ jāyate phalam |
T01n2925u_001:31: bījair vinā phalaṃ nāsti kaḥ prājñaḥ pratipatsyate ||
T01n2925u_001:32: (16) bījabhūtas tv asau dhātur dharmāṇām āśrayo mataḥ |
T01n2925u_001:34: (17) nirmālau candrasūryau hi āvṛtau pañcabhir malaiḥ |
T01n2925u_001:36: (18) evaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ cittam āvṛtaṃ pañcabhir malaiḥ |
T01n2925u_001:38: (19) (4) agniśaucaṃ yathā vastraṃ malinaṃ vividhair malaiḥ |
T01n2925u_001:39: agnimadhye yathā kṣiptaṃ malaṃ dagdhaṃ na vastratā ||
T01n2925u_001:40: (20) evaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ cittaṃ malinaṃ rāgajair malaiḥ |
T01n2925u_001:41: jñānāgninā malaṃ dagdhaṃ na dagdhaṃ tat prabhāsvaram ||
T01n2925u_001:42: (21) śūnyatāhārakāḥ sūtrā ye kecid bhāṣitā jinaiḥ |
T01n2925u_001:43: sarvais taiḥ kleśavyāvṛttir naiva dhātor vināśanam ||
T01n2925u_001:46: (23) dharmadhātur yato nātmā na ca strīnṛnapuṃsakaḥ |
T01n2925u_001:48: (24) sarve dharmā hy asaṃsaktāḥ strīpuṃstvaṃ hi na vidyate |
T01n2925u_001:52: (26) yathā hi garbho garbhiṇyāṃ vidyate na ca dṛśyate |
T01n2925u_001:53: tathā hi kleśasañchannaṃ dharmatattvaṃ na dṛśyate ||
T01n2925u_001:59: (29) yathā śaśaviṣāṇāṃ hi kalpyamānaṃ na vidyate |
T01n2925u_001:60: tathā hi sarvadharmeṣu kalpitaṃ naiva vidyate ||
T01n2925u_001:62: yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt tasya kiṃ kalpyate buddhaiḥ ||
T01n2925u_001:64: ekasya sambhavo nāsti kathaṃ bālair vikalpyate ||
T01n2925u_001:71: (35) grīṣmakāle yathā vāri uṣṇam ity abhidhīyate |
T01n2925u_001:72: tad eva śītakāleṣu śītam ity abhidhīyate ||
T01n2925u_001:74: (8) tad eva kleśāpagamād buddha ity abhidhīyate ||
T01n2925u_001:75: (37) cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca avabhāsāḥ sunirmalāḥ |
T01n2925u_001:77: (38) śrotram pratītya śabdaṃ ca cittaṃ vijñaptayas trayaḥ |
T01n2925u_001:87: (43) paśyate śṛṇute ghrāti svādate spṛśatīti ca |
T01n2925u_001:89: (44) cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca ghrāṇaṃ ca jihvā kāyo manas tathā |
T01n2925u_001:91: (45) (10) cittam eva dvidhā dṛṣṭaṃ loki lokottaraṃ ca yat |
T01n2925u_001:92: ātmagrāheṇa saṃsāraḥ pratyātma tathātā hi tat ||
T01n2925u_001:93: (46) rāgakṣayo hi nirvāṇaṃ dveṣamohakṣayaś ca yat |
T01n2925u_001:95: (47) asmiṃ kalevare sarvaṃ jñānam ajñānam eva ca |
T01n2925u_001:97: (48) bodhir na dūre nāsanne na gatā nāpi vāgatā |
T01n2925u_001:102: (50) na bodher dūraṃ sañjñī syān na sāsannā ca sañjñinaḥ |
T01n2925u_001:105: kṣīraṃ pibanti haṃsā hi udakaṃ ca tathā sthitam ||
T01n2925u_001:106: (52) evaṃ hi kleśasammiśraṃ jñānam ekatra bhājane |
T01n2925u_001:107: pibanti yogino jñānam ajñānaṃ sphorayanti te ||
T01n2925u_001:108: (53) ahaṃ mameti vā grāho yāvad bāhyo vikalpyate |
T01n2925u_001:112: kalpayanti dvayaṃ bālā advayaṃ yogināṃ padam ||
T01n2925u_001:115: (56) vīryaṃ ca sarvadharmeṣu dhyāne cittaṃ pracāritam |
T01n2925u_001:116: prajñāyām acalaṃ nityaṃ bodhipuṣṭir iyaṃ punaḥ ||
T01n2925u_001:134: (64) yathaiva bālacandrasya dṛṣṭā vṛddhiḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe |
T01n2925u_001:135: tathā bhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭā vṛddhiḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe ||
T01n2925u_001:136: (65) yathā hi pañcadaśyāṃ vai pūrṇacandro hi jāyate |
T01n2925u_001:138: (66) adhimuktidṛḍhaṃ yasya buddhe dharme ca nityaśaḥ |
T01n2925u_001:139: utpādayati tac cittam anivartyam bhave bhave ||
T01n2925u_001:142: (68) malimaṃ nityakālaṃ hi rāgādyair vividhair malaiḥ |
T01n2925u_001:143: malābhāve ca yā śuddhiḥ vimalety abhidhīyate ||
T01n2925u_001:149: durjayānāṃ hi kleśānāṃ vijayā tu sudurjayā ||
T01n2925u_001:158: (76) kāyaṃ jñānamayaṃ rāmyam ākāśam iva nirmalam |
T01n2925u_001:164: tvam acintyo'si sarveṣāṃ kas tvā vijñātum arhati ||
T01n2925u_001:173: (83) daśabhiś ca balair bālas tiṣṭhate bālacandravat |
T01n2925u_001:175: (84) yadā pretāḥ samantāt tu śuṣkaṃ paśyanti sāgaram |
T01n2925u_001:177: (85) sattvānām alpapuṇyānāṃ bhagavān kiṃ kariṣyati | jātya ......... (19)
